channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- IoTDB
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- IoTDB

item.title: CVE-2020-1952|2024-08-04T06:54:00.401Z -- apache -- iotdb
item.description: An issue was found in Apache IoTDB .9.0 to 0.9.1 and 0.8.0 to 0.8.2. When starting IoTDB, the JMX port 31999 is exposed with no certification.Then, clients could execute code remotely.
